comment.brief: A resources is being loaded, either locally or remotely. Resolution could take several seconds.
comment.full: A resources is being loaded, either locally or remotely. Resolution could take several seconds.

comment.brief: There is a deferred processing, such as Defer, that is expected to resolve in a few frames.
comment.full: There is a deferred processing, such as Defer, that is expected to resolve in a few frames.

comment.brief: An extended processing, such as calculation, is happening on the node, resolution could take several seconds, or longer
comment.full: An extended processing, such as calculation, is happening on the node, resolution could take several seconds, or longer

comment.brief: Setup of the node and its children that should resolve in a couple of frames.
comment.full: Setup of the node and its children that should resolve in a couple of frames.

comment.brief: There is a failure condition. Resolution may or may not be automatic
comment.full: There is a failure condition. Resolution may or may not be automatic

comment.brief: Busy activities that should resolve within a few frames
comment.full: Busy activities that should resolve within a few frames

comment.brief: Busy activities tat may take several seconds, or longer,  to resolve
comment.full: Busy activities tat may take several seconds, or longer,  to resolve

comment.brief: A complete list of all possible BusyTaskActivity's
comment.full: A complete list of all possible BusyTaskActivity's

comment.brief: Defers the freezing of the panel until the children are no longer busy.
comment.full:
Defers the freezing of the panel until the children are no longer busy.

When `None` (the default), the freezing will happen the same frame `IsFrozen` is set to `true`. Otherwise the panel will wait for all children to clear the busy status of this type before doing the freezing.
